name: From Nothing to Nothing
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare gamejam in 48 hours in October 2019.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/from-nothing-to-nothing

Get ready for a trip down an emotional roller coaster! Get ready to laugh and in the end be prepared to feel some hurt.

From Nothing To Nothing is a journey through a place where no one has been - the afterlife. Find your way out of the tomb you’ve awoken in and find out how you got there.

Watch the timelapse here:
